It adopts and promotes good business resilience practices to ensure the Bank is prepared for all eventualities. The BCM framework is designed to: Protect our people; Protect the Bank; Mitigate risk; Meet regulatory requirements; Safeguard revenues and sustain stable financial markets and customer confidence. The role will be responsible for supporting Global & Regional Business Continuity Partners, Business Continuity Coordinators and Accountable Managers to ensure strong compliance to policy and minimum control standards.
